body:
Hey everyone, how are you doing? It's been a while since I've created a forum thread. 

First off, I'd like to wish everyone a Happy 4th of July/Independence Day! Surprisingly, my birthday falls on the same day as well. So, AMA. :)
body_tagged:

title: Birthday AMA

replies.body: Happy fourth to you also! But why did you make this AMA?
replies.body_tagged: Happy fourth to you also! But why did you make this AMA?

replies.body: I'd like to make this AMA mainly because I'm bored and it's the first time I'm making an AMA. So, why not?
